. A moving body with no damping and no external forces will continue moving indefinitely, as is the case in space. A moving body with damping will gradually stop moving.

trans-unit.source: 1 if the graphics framerate is synchronized with the monitor's refresh rate, 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果图形帧率与显示器的刷新率同步,则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: 1-based index indicating where to start reading in the Data. Negative values can be used to read relative from the end of the Data object.
trans-unit.target: 基于1的索引,表示在Data中从哪里开始读取。负值可用于从Data对象的末端相对读取。

trans-unit.source: 2D and cube texture types are supported everywhere. Array textures require a system that supports OpenGL 3 or OpenGL ES 3. Volume / 3D textures require a system that supports OpenGL 2 or OpenGL ES 3.
trans-unit.target: 到处都支持2D和立方体纹理类型。阵列纹理需要支持OpenGL 3或OpenGL ES 3的系统。 体积/3D纹理需要支持OpenGL 2或OpenGL ES 3的系统。

trans-unit.source: 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4 matrix to send to the extern. Using table form: {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... }
trans-unit.target: 2x2、3x3或4x4矩阵发送到外部。使用表格形式： {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... }

trans-unit.source: 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4 matrix to send to the uniform variable. Using table form: {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... } or (since version 0.10.2) {a,b,c,d, e,f,g,h, ...}.
trans-unit.target: 2x2、3x3或4x4矩阵发送到统一变量。使用表格形式： {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... } 或（自版本0.10.2以来） {a,b,c,d, e,f,g,h, ...} 。

trans-unit.source: 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4 matrix to send to the uniform variable. Using table form: {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... } or (since version 0.10.2) {a,b,c,d, e,f,g,h, ...}. The order in 0.10.2 is column-major; starting in 11.0 it's row-major instead.
trans-unit.target: 将2x2、3x3或4x4矩阵发送到统一变量。使用表格形式： {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... } 或（从版本0.10.2开始） {a,b,c,d, e,f,g,h, ...} 。0.10.2中的顺序是主要列；从11.0开始，它改为以行为主。

trans-unit.source: 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4 matrix to send to the uniform variable. Using table form: {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... } or {a,b,c,d, e,f,g,h, ...}.
trans-unit.target: 将2x2、3x3或4x4矩阵发送到统一变量。使用表格形式： {{a,b,c,d}, {e,f,g,h}, ... } 或 {a,b,c,d, e,f,g,h, ...} 。

trans-unit.source: 3D texture with width, height, and depth. Requires a custom shader to use. Volume textures can have texture filtering applied along the 3rd axis.
trans-unit.target: 具有宽度，高度和深度的3D纹理。需要使用自定义着色器。体积纹理可以沿第3轴应用纹理过滤。

trans-unit.source: 8 bits per channel (32 bpp) RGBA. Color channel values range from 0-255 (0-1 in shaders).
trans-unit.target: 每通道8位(32 bpp)RGBA。颜色通道值范围为0-255(在着色器中为0-1)。

trans-unit.source: : A spinning body with no damping and no external forces will continue spinning indefinitely. A spinning body with damping will gradually stop spinning.
trans-unit.target: ：无阻尼且无外力的旋转体将无限期继续旋转。具有阻尼的旋转体将逐渐停止旋转。

trans-unit.source: File:flush will force any buffered data to be written to the disk.
trans-unit.target: File：flush将强制将所有缓冲的数据写入磁盘。

trans-unit.source: File:open must be called on the file before reading from or writing to it. File:getFilename will return the full platform-dependent path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 在读取或写入文件之前，必须在文件上调用File：open。File：getFilename将返回与平台有关的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Body:getLinearVelocityFromLocalPoint allows you to specify the point in local coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Body：getLinearVelocityFromLocalPoint允许您在本地坐标中指定点。

trans-unit.source: Body:getLinearVelocityFromWorldPoint allows you to specify the point in world coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Body：getLinearVelocityFromWorldPoint允许您指定世界坐标中的点。

trans-unit.source: ByteData/string which contains the decoded version of source.
trans-unit.target: ByteData /包含源的解码版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: ByteData/string which contains the encoded version of source.
trans-unit.target: ByteData /包含源的编码版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Canvases created with stencil and/or depth PixelFormats are not readable by default, unless readable=true is specified in the settings table passed into love.graphics.newCanvas.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，用模板和/或深度PixelFormats创建的画布是不可读的，除非在传递给love.graphics.newCanvas的设置表中指定了 readable=true 。

trans-unit.source: Canvases which use the "normal" or "srgb" CanvasFormat will have their content blended in linear RGB and the result will be stored in the canvas in sRGB, when drawing to them. When the Canvas itself is drawn, its pixel colors will be converted from sRGB to linear RGB in the same manner as Images. Keeping the canvas pixel data stored as sRGB allows for better precision (less banding) for darker colors compared to "rgba8".
trans-unit.target: 画布其中使用“正常”或“的sRGB” CanvasFormat人员在内容中的线性RGB混合和拉伸到他们时，结果将被存储在sRGB的画布。绘制画布本身时，其像素颜色将以与图像相同的方式从sRGB转换为线性RGB。与“ rgba8”相比，将画布像素数据保存为sRGB可以为深色提供更好的精度（较少的条纹）。

trans-unit.source: Canvases, Shaders, mipmaps, npot textures, and the subtract BlendMode are always supported in version 0.10.0 and newer (due to its system requirements.)
trans-unit.target: 画布，着色，MIP贴图，纹理npot和减法的BlendMode总是在版本支持0.10.0和更新（由于其系统的要求。）

trans-unit.source: CompressedData/string which contains the compressed version of data.
trans-unit.target: CompressedData /字符串，其中包含数据的压缩版本。

trans-unit.source: CompressedData/string which contains the compressed version of rawstring.
trans-unit.target: CompressedData /字符串，其中包含rawstring的压缩版本。

trans-unit.source: Data representing the contents of a file.
Data/string containing the raw decompressed data.
trans-unit.target: 包含原始解压缩数据的数据/字符串。

trans-unit.source: Data/string which contains the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 包含序列化数据的数据/字符串。

trans-unit.source: Data:getPointer along with LuaJIT's FFI can be used to manipulate the contents of the ByteData object after it has been created.
trans-unit.target: 创建ByteData对象后，可以使用Data：getPointer以及LuaJIT的FFI。

trans-unit.source: Data:getString and Data:getPointer will return the original Data object's contents, with the view's offset and size applied.
trans-unit.target: Data：getString和Data：getPointer将返回原始Data对象的内容，并应用视图的偏移量和大小。

trans-unit.source: FileData or string containing the file contents.
trans-unit.target: FileData或包含文件内容的字符串。

trans-unit.source: FileData or string containing the read bytes.
trans-unit.target: FileData或包含读取字节的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Array textures can be rendered with love.graphics.drawLayer, with love.graphics.draw and a Quad via Quad:setLayer, or by sending it to a custom Shader. When getting the pixels of a layer of an Array Texture in a shader, a third texture coordinate component is used to choose which layer to get.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用love.graphics.drawLayer，love.graphics.draw和Quad（通过Quad：setLayer）或通过将其发送到自定义的Shader来渲染阵列纹理。在着色器中获取“阵列纹理”层的像素时，将使用第三个纹理坐标组件来选择要获取的层。

trans-unit.source: Mipmapping is useful when drawing an image at a reduced scale. It can improve performance and reduce aliasing issues.
trans-unit.target: 当以较小的比例绘制图像时，Mipmapping很有用。它可以提高性能并减少混叠问题。

trans-unit.source: Simplex noise is closely related to Perlin noise. It is widely used for procedural content generation.
trans-unit.target: 单纯形噪声与Perlin噪声密切相关。它被广泛用于过程内容的生成。

trans-unit.source: Cubemap texture with 6 faces. Requires a custom shader (and Shader:send) to use. Sampling from a cube texture in a shader takes a 3D direction vector instead of a texture coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 具有6个面的Cubemap纹理。需要使用自定义着色器（和Shader：send）才能使用。从着色器中的立方体纹理采样采用3D方向矢量，而不是纹理坐标。

trans-unit.source: Mipmapping is useful when drawing a texture at a reduced scale. It can improve performance and reduce aliasing issues.
trans-unit.target: 当以较小的比例绘制纹理时，Mipmapping很有用。它可以提高性能并减少混叠问题。

trans-unit.source: Simplex noise is closely related to Perlin noise. It is widely used for procedural content generation.
trans-unit.target: 单纯形噪声与Perlin噪声密切相关。它被广泛用于过程内容的生成。

trans-unit.source: 0.9.0 (bug) Images are not released from memory automatically when nil-ing meshes. Call Mesh:setImage() to manually clear.
trans-unit.target: 0.9.0（错误）在进行网格划分时，图像不会自动从内存中释放。调用Mesh：setImage（）手动清除。

trans-unit.source: 0.9.1 (bug) Textures are not released from memory automatically when nil-ing meshes. Call Mesh:setTexture() to manually clear.
trans-unit.target: 0.9.1（错误）在关闭网格时，纹理不会自动从内存中释放。调用Mesh：setTexture（）手动清除。

trans-unit.source: HSL color (an alternate color space, based on human perception)
trans-unit.target: HSL颜色（基于人类感知的备用颜色空间）

trans-unit.source: Images will have their colors automatically converted from sRGB to linear RGB when drawing them (and when getting their pixels in a Shader), unless the flag linear = true is set when creating the Image.
trans-unit.target: 绘制图像时（以及在着色器中获取像素时），图像的颜色会自动从sRGB转换为线性RGB ，除非在创建Image时设置了 linear = true 标志。

trans-unit.source: love.conf may have more extensive documentation on the behavior of each window flag.
trans-unit.target: love.conf可能具有有关每个窗口标志行为的更详尽的文档。

trans-unit.source: love.data.decompress can be used to de-compress the data (or love.math.decompress in 0.10.2 or earlier).
trans-unit.target: love.data.decompress可用于解压缩的数据（或者love.math.decompress在0.10.2或更早）。

trans-unit.source: love.graphics functions and objects will cause a hard crash of LÖVE if used while the window is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在关闭窗口的情况下使用love.graphics函数和对象，将导致LÖVE严重崩溃。

trans-unit.source: love.graphics.getDimensions gets the dimensions of the window in units scaled by the screen's DPI scale factor, rather than pixels. Use getDimensions for calculations related to drawing to the screen and using the graphics coordinate system (calculating the center of the screen, for example), and getPixelDimensions only when dealing specifically with underlying pixels (pixel-related calculations in a pixel Shader, for example).
trans-unit.target: love.graphics.getDimensions获取窗口的尺寸，该尺寸由屏幕的DPI比例因子（而不是像素）缩放。使用getDimensions进行与绘制到屏幕和使用图形坐标系有关的计算（例如，计算屏幕的中心），仅在专门处理基础像素时才使用getPixelDimensions（例如，在像素Shader中与像素有关的计算） 。

trans-unit.source: Array images are a much better choice than volume images for storing multiple different sprites in a single array image for directly drawing them.
trans-unit.target: 阵列图像是比体积图像更好的选择，因为在单个阵列图像中存储多个不同的精灵以直接绘制它们时，体积图像是更好的选择。

trans-unit.source: love.graphics.setScissor will restrict the area of the Canvas that this function affects.
trans-unit.target: love.graphics.setScissor将限制此功能影响的画布区域。

trans-unit.source: love.math.decompress can be used to de-compress the data.
Mesh:setVertices or Mesh:setVertex and Mesh:setDrawRange can be used to specify vertex information once the Mesh is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建网格后，可以使用Mesh：setVertices或Mesh：setVertex和Mesh：setDrawRange指定顶点信息。

trans-unit.source: PolygonShapes in love.physics, some forms of Meshes, and polygons drawn with love.graphics.polygon must be simple convex polygons.
trans-unit.target: PolygonShapes在love.physics，某些形式的网格与绘制和多边形love.graphics.polygon必须简单凸多边形。

trans-unit.source: Scancodes are keyboard layout-independent, so the scancode "w" will be generated if the key in the same place as the "w" key on an American keyboard is pressed, no matter what the key is labelled or what the user's operating system settings are.
trans-unit.target: 扫描码，如果在同一个地方的“W”的关键的关键是键盘布局无关，所以扫描码“W”将产生美国键盘被按下时，无论什么键被标记或什么用户的操作系统设置是。

trans-unit.source: Scancodes are keyboard layout-independent, so the scancode "w" will be used if the key in the same place as the "w" key on an American keyboard is pressed, no matter what the key is labelled or what the user's operating system settings are.
trans-unit.target: 扫描码的键盘布局无关，所以扫描码“W”将被告知是否在同一个地方的“W”的关键钥匙使用美式键盘被按下时，无论什么键被标记或什么用户的操作系统设置是。

trans-unit.source: Scancodes are keyboard layout-independent, so the scancode "w" will be used if the key in the same place as the "w" key on an American keyboard is released, no matter what the key is labelled or what the user's operating system settings are.
trans-unit.target: 扫描码的键盘布局无关，所以“W”，如果为“W”的关键在同一个地方的密钥将使用的扫描美国键盘被释放，无论什么键被标记或什么用户的操作系统设置是。

trans-unit.source: Shapes are objects used to control mass and collisions.
trans-unit.target: 形状是用于控制质量和碰撞的对象。

trans-unit.source: SpriteBatches, ParticleSystems, Meshes, and Text objects do their own batching and do not affect automatic batching of other draws, aside from flushing the current batch when they're drawn.
trans-unit.target: SpriteBatches，ParticleSystems，Meshs和Text对象执行其自身的批处理，并且不影响其他图形的自动批处理，除了在绘制它们时刷新当前批处理之外。

trans-unit.source: Texture:getDimensions gets the dimensions of the texture in units scaled by the texture's DPI scale factor, rather than pixels. Use getDimensions for calculations related to drawing the texture (calculating an origin offset, for example), and getPixelDimensions only when dealing specifically with pixels, for example when using Canvas:newImageData.
trans-unit.target: Texture：getDimensions以纹理的DPI比例因子而不是像素为单位获取纹理的尺寸。使用getDimensions进行与绘制纹理有关的计算（例如，计算原点偏移），仅在专门处理像素时（例如，在使用Canvas：newImageData时）使用getPixelDimensions。

trans-unit.source: Texture:getHeight gets the height of the texture in units scaled by the texture's DPI scale factor, rather than pixels. Use getHeight for calculations related to drawing the texture (calculating an origin offset, for example), and getPixelHeight only when dealing specifically with pixels, for example when using Canvas:newImageData.
trans-unit.target: Texture：getHeight以纹理的DPI比例因子（而不是像素）为单位获取纹理的高度。使用getHeight进行与绘制纹理有关的计算（例如，计算原点偏移），仅在专门处理像素（例如，使用Canvas：newImageData）时，才使用getPixelHeight。

trans-unit.source: Texture:getWidth gets the width of the texture in units scaled by the texture's DPI scale factor, rather than pixels. Use getWidth for calculations related to drawing the texture (calculating an origin offset, for example), and getPixelWidth only when dealing specifically with pixels, for example when using Canvas:newImageData.
trans-unit.target: Texture：getWidth以纹理的DPI比例因子而不是像素为单位获取纹理的宽度。使用getWidth进行与绘制纹理有关的计算（例如，计算原点偏移），仅在专门处理像素时（例如，在使用Canvas：newImageData时）使用getPixelWidth。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using blocking operations (network connect/read/write, or socket.sleep), the whole LÖVE main loop will be blocked, and it is usually a bad idea. So use only non-blocking operations if possible, or use it in a thread.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用阻塞操作（网络连接/读取/写入或socket.sleep）时，整个LÖVE主循环将被阻塞，通常这是一个坏主意。因此，如果可能，请仅使用非阻塞操作，或者在线程中使用它。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using blocking operations (network connect/read/write, or socket.sleep), the whole LÖVE main loop will be blocked, and it is usually a bad idea. So use only nonblocking operations if possible.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用阻塞操作（网络连接/读取/写入或socket.sleep）时，整个LÖVE主循环将被阻塞，通常这是一个坏主意。因此，如果可能，仅使用非阻塞操作。

trans-unit.source: This is only raw "documentation" of function, that I found, but was not documented. Please update it and then remove this notice!
trans-unit.target: 这只是我发现的功能的原始“文档”，但未进行文档记录。请对其进行更新，然后删除此通知！

trans-unit.source: Writing to multiple lines: In Windows, some text editors (e.g. Notepad before Windows 10 1809) only treat CRLF ("\r\n") as a new line.
trans-unit.target: 写入多行：在Windows中，某些文本编辑器（例如Windows 10 1809之前的记事本）仅将CRLF（“ \ r \ n”）视为新行。

trans-unit.source: Writing to multiple lines: In Windows, some text editors (e.g. Notepad) only treat CRLF ("\r\n") as a new line.
trans-unit.target: 写入多行：在Windows中，某些文本编辑器（例如记事本）仅将CRLF（“ \ r \ n”）视为新行。

trans-unit.source: canvas, multicanvas, npot, and shader have roughly the same minimum requirements for support: a DirectX 9.0c+ capable graphics card with drivers that support ~OpenGL 2.1+.
trans-unit.target: canvas ， multicanvas ， npot 和 shader 的支持最低要求大致相同：支持DirectX 9.0c +的图形卡，其驱动程序支持〜OpenGL 2.1+。

trans-unit.source: clampzero is supported on all desktop systems, but only some mobile devices. If it's not supported and it's attempted to be set, the "clamp" wrap mode will automatically be used instead.
trans-unit.target: clampzero 所有台式机系统均支持lampzero，但仅某些移动设备受支持。如果不支持并尝试设置它，则将自动使用“ clamp”包装模式。

trans-unit.source: fullnpot, pixelshaderhighp, and shaderderivatives are supported on all desktop systems and most mobile systems, except for some older OpenGL ES 2 devices.
trans-unit.target: fullnpot 除了某些较旧的OpenGL ES 2设备外，所有台式机系统和大多数移动系统都支持fullnpot， pixelshaderhighp 和 shaderderivatives 类。

trans-unit.source: glsl3 and instancing are supported on OpenGL 3 and OpenGL ES 3-capable systems.
trans-unit.target: glsl3 在支持OpenGL 3和OpenGL ES 3的系统上支持glsl3和 instancing 。

trans-unit.source: hdrcanvas, bc5, and srgb all share mostly the same minimum requirements for support as well: a DirectX 10+ capable graphics card with drivers that support ~OpenGL 3+.
trans-unit.target: hdrcanvas ， bc5 和 srgb 几乎都共享相同的最低支持要求：具有DirectX 10+功能的图形卡，其驱动程序支持〜OpenGL 3+。

trans-unit.source: instancing is also supported on some older systems that don't support GLSL 3, but vertex attribute-based instancing must be used in that case (instead of love_InstanceID in a GLSL 3 shader).
trans-unit.target: instancing 在不支持GLSL 3的某些较旧的系统上也支持instancing，但是在这种情况下，必须使用基于顶点属性的实例化（而不是GLSL 3着色器中的 love_InstanceID ）。

trans-unit.source: lighten is supported on all desktop systems, and OpenGL ES 3-capable mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: lighten 支持所有桌面系统，和OpenGL ES 3-能力的移动设备。

trans-unit.source: multicanvasformats is supported on OpenGL 3-capable desktop systems, and OpenGL ES 3-capable mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: multicanvasformats 在支持OpenGL 3的桌面系统和支持OpenGL ES 3的移动设备上支持multicanvasformats。

trans-unit.source: rgb565 is often only supported on OpenGL ES / mobile devices, or with very new desktop OpenGL drivers.
trans-unit.target: rgb565 通常仅在OpenGL ES /移动设备或非常新的桌面OpenGL驱动程序上受支持。

trans-unit.source: subtractive, mipmap, and dxt are supported on nearly every system.
trans-unit.target: subtractive 几乎每个系统都支持subtractive， mipmap 和 dxt 。

trans-unit.source: t.version should be a string, representing the version of LÖVE for which your game was made.
trans-unit.target: t.version 应该是一个字符串，代表您制作游戏的LÖVE的版本。

trans-unit.source: t.version should be a string, representing the version of LÖVE for which your game was made. It should be formatted as "X.Y.Z" where X is the major release number, Y the minor, and Z the patch level. It allows LÖVE to display a warning if it isn't compatible. Its default is the version of LÖVE running.
trans-unit.target: t.version 应该是一个字符串，代表您制作游戏的LÖVE的版本。它的格式应为 "X.Y.Z" ，其中 X 是主要发行版号， Y 是次要发行版， Z 是补丁程序级别。如果不兼容，它允许LÖVE显示警告。它的默认值为LÖVE运行的版本。

trans-unit.source: true if specified shader code doesn't contain any errors. false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: true 如果指定的着色器代码不包含任何错误，则为true。否则为 false 。

一个16位整数,代表被掩盖的类别。

trans-unit.target: 贝塞尔曲线对象，可以评估和渲染任意程度的贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: A Bézier curve object that can evaluate and render Bézier curves of arbitrary degree. For more information on Bézier curves check this great article on Wikipedia.

trans-unit.source: A Bézier curve object that can evaluate and render Bézier curves of arbitrary degree. For more information on Bézier curves check this great article on Wikipedia.

trans-unit.source: A BezierCurve that corresponds to the specified segment.

A Canvas is used for off-screen rendering. Think of it as an invisible screen that you can draw to, but that will not be visible until you draw it to the actual visible screen. It is also known as "render to texture".
trans-unit.target: 画布是用来进行离屏渲染的。把它想象成一个不可见的屏幕,你可以把它画到屏幕上,但直到你把它画到实际可见的屏幕上才会可见。它也被称为 "渲染到纹理"。

trans-unit.source: A ChainShape consists of multiple line segments.
A ChainShape consists of multiple line segments. It can be used to create the boundaries of your terrain. The shape does not have volume and can only collide with PolygonShape and CircleShape.
trans-unit.target: ChainShape由多个线段组成。它可用于创建地形边界。形状没有体积，只能与PolygonShape和CircleShape碰撞。

trans-unit.source: A CompressedImageData object. The Image will use this CompressedImageData to reload itself when love.window.setMode is called.
trans-unit.target: 一个CompressedImageData对象。调用love.window.setMode时，Image将使用此CompressedImageData重新加载自身。

trans-unit.source: A DPI scale of 2 (double the normal pixel density) will result in the image taking up the same space on-screen as an image with half its pixel dimensions that has a DPI scale of 1. This allows for easily swapping out image assets that take the same space on-screen but have different pixel densities, which makes supporting high-dpi / retina resolution require less code logic.
trans-unit.target: DPI比例为2(正常像素密度的两倍)将导致图像在屏幕上占用的空间与DPI比例为1的一半像素尺寸的图像相同。 这允许轻松地交换在屏幕上占用相同空间但具有不同像素密度的图像资产,这使得支持高DPI/视网膜分辨率需要较少的代码逻辑。

trans-unit.source: A Data object containing data previously compressed with love.data.compress.
trans-unit.target: 一个Data对象，其中包含以前用love.data.compress压缩的数据。

trans-unit.source: A Data object containing data previously compressed with love.math.compress.
trans-unit.target: 一个Data对象，其中包含先前使用love.math.compress压缩的数据。

trans-unit.source: A Data object containing the packed (serialized) data.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含打包(序列化)数据的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: A Data object containing the raw (un-compressed) data to compress.
trans-unit.target: 一个数据对象,包含要压缩的原始(未压缩)数据。

trans-unit.source: A Data object to copy from. The contents of the Data must match the layout of this Mesh's vertex format.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的数据对象。数据的内容必须匹配此网格的顶点格式的布局。

trans-unit.source: A EdgeShape is a line segment. They can be used to create the boundaries of your terrain. The shape does not have volume and can only collide with PolygonShape and CircleShape.
trans-unit.target: EdgeShape是线段。它们可用于创建地形边界。形状没有体积，只能与PolygonShape和CircleShape碰撞。

trans-unit.source: A File pointing to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: 一个指向音频文件的文件。

trans-unit.source: A FileData containing a compressed image.
A FileData potentially containing a compressed image.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能包含压缩图像的FileData。

trans-unit.source: A Font object which can be used to draw text on screen.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于在屏幕上绘制文字的字体对象。

trans-unit.source: A FontData represents a font, containing the font Rasterizer and its glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 一个FontData代表一个字体,包含字体Rasterizer和它的字形。

trans-unit.source: A Framebuffer is used for off-screen rendering. Think of it as an invisible screen that you can draw to, but that will not be visible until you draw it to the actual visible screen. It is also known as "render to texture".
trans-unit.target: Framebuffer用于离屏渲染。把它想象成一个不可见的屏幕,你可以把它画到屏幕上,但直到你把它画到实际可见的屏幕上才会可见。它也被称为 "渲染到纹理"。

trans-unit.source: A FrictionJoint applies friction to a body.
trans-unit.target: 摩擦关节(FrictionJoint)将摩擦力施加到主体上。

trans-unit.source: A GlyphData represents a drawable symbol of a font Rasterizer.
trans-unit.target: 一个GlyphData代表一个字体Rasterizer的可绘制符号。

trans-unit.source: A GlyphData represents a drawable symbol of a font.
trans-unit.target: 一个GlyphData代表一个字体的可绘制符号。

trans-unit.source: A Lua error has occurred in a thread
A Lua error has occurred in a thread.
A Mesh must have a "VertexPosition" attribute in order to be drawn, but it can be attached from a different Mesh via Mesh:attachAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 为了绘制网格，网格必须具有“ VertexPosition”属性，但是可以通过Mesh：attachAttribute从其他网格附加网格。

trans-unit.source: A Mesh must have at least 4 * SpriteBatch:getBufferSize vertices in order to be attachable to a SpriteBatch.
trans-unit.target: 网格必须至少具有4 * SpriteBatch：getBufferSize顶点才能连接到SpriteBatch。

trans-unit.source: A ParticleSystem can be used to create particle effects like fire or smoke.
trans-unit.target: 粒子系统可以用来创建粒子效果,如火或烟。

trans-unit.source: A PixelEffect contains at least one function, named effect, which is the effect itself, but it can contain additional functions.
trans-unit.target: PixelEffect至少包含一个名为 effect 的函数，即效果本身，但它可以包含其他函数。

trans-unit.source: A PixelEffect is used for advanced hardware-accelerated pixel manipulation. These effects are written in a language based on GLSL (OpenGL Shading Language) with a few things simplified for easier coding.
trans-unit.target: PixelEffect用于高级的硬件加速像素操作。这些效果是用基于GLSL(OpenGL Shading Language,OpenGL着色语言)的语言编写的,为了便于编码,简化了一些东西。

trans-unit.source: A PixelEffect object for use in drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于绘图操作的PixelEffect对象。

trans-unit.source: A PolygonShape is a convex polygon with up to 8 vertices.
trans-unit.target: 一个PolygonShape是一个最多有8个顶点的凸多边形。

trans-unit.source: A Rasterizer handles font rendering, containing the font data (image or TrueType font) and drawable glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 一个光栅化器处理字体渲染,包含字体数据(图像或TrueType字体)和可绘制的字形。

trans-unit.source: A Rasterizer represents font data and glyphs.

A Shader is used for advanced hardware-accelerated pixel or vertex manipulation. These effects are written in a language based on GLSL (OpenGL Shading Language) with a few things simplified for easier coding.
trans-unit.target: Shader用于高级硬件加速的像素或顶点操作。这些效果是用基于GLSL(OpenGL Shading Language,OpenGL着色语言)的语言编写的,并简化了一些东西,以便于编码。

trans-unit.source: A Shader object for use in drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于绘图操作的Shader对象。

trans-unit.source: A Source represents audio you can play back.
trans-unit.target: 音源代表您可以播放的音频。

trans-unit.source: A Source represents audio you can play back. You can do interesting things with Sources, like set the volume, pitch, and its position relative to the listener. Please note that positional audio only works for mono (i.e. non-stereo) sources.
trans-unit.target: Source代表你可以播放的音频。你可以对音源做一些有趣的事情,比如设置音量、音调和它相对于听众的位置。请注意,定位音频只适用于单声道(即非立体声)音源。

trans-unit.source: A SpriteBatch can be even more useful when the underlying image is a texture atlas (a single image file containing many independent images); by adding Quads to the batch, different sub-images from within the atlas can be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当基础图像是纹理图集（包含许多独立图像的单个图像文件）时，SpriteBatch可能会更加有用。通过将四边形添加到批处理中，可以在图集中绘制不同的子图像。

trans-unit.source: A SpriteBatch can be even more useful when the underlying image is a texture atlas (a single image file containing many independent images); by adding Quads to the batch, different sub-images from within the atlas can be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当基础图像是纹理图集（包含许多独立图像的单个图像文件）时，SpriteBatch可能会更加有用。通过将四边形添加到批处理中，可以在图集中绘制不同的子图像。

trans-unit.source: A Thread is a chunk of code that can run in parallel with other threads. Data can be sent between different threads with Channel objects.
trans-unit.target: 线程是可以与其他线程并行运行的代码块。可以使用Channel对象在不同线程之间发送数据。
一个线程代表一个线程。

trans-unit.source: A WeldJoint essentially glues two bodies together.
trans-unit.target: WeldJoint本质上是将两个体粘合在一起。

trans-unit.source: A bind_address of nil makes a host that can not be connected to (typically a client). Otherwise the address can either be of the form <ipaddress>:<port>, <hostname>:<port>, or *:<port>.
trans-unit.target: bind_address为nil会使主机无法连接（通常是客户端）。否则，地址的格式可以为<ipaddress>：<端口>，<主机名>：<端口>或*：<端口>。

trans-unit.source: A body becomes frozen when it goes outside the world boundary. A frozen body is no longer changed by World:update.
trans-unit.target: 当身体超出世界边界时，它会冻结。World：update不再更改冻结的身体。

trans-unit.source: A body with with a larger mass will react less. The reaction does not depend on the timestep, and is equivalent to applying a force continuously for 1 second. Impulses are best used to give a single push to a body. For a continuous push to a body it is better to use Body:applyForce.
trans-unit.target: 质量较大的物体的反应较小。该反应也不能依赖于时间步长，并且等同于1秒钟连续地施加的力。最好将脉冲用于推动身体。为了持续推动身体，最好使用Body：applyForce。

trans-unit.source: A bounding box is the smallest rectangle that encapsulates the entire polygon.
trans-unit.target: 界框是囊括整个多边形的最小矩形。

trans-unit.source: A bounding box of the fixture.
A bug in 0.8.0 causes memory corruption if this function gets called on a ChainShape with more than 8 points.
trans-unit.target: 如果在具有8点以上的ChainShape上调用此函数，则0.8.0中的错误会导致内存损坏。

trans-unit.source: A canvas to texture the quad with.
trans-unit.target: 一块画布,可以让四合院变得更有质感。

trans-unit.source: A color must be specified for each active Canvas, when this function variant is used.
trans-unit.target: 当使用该函数变体时,必须为每个活动的Canvas指定一个颜色。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic body has mass and can move. It will react to collisions when the world is updated.
trans-unit.target: 动态体有质量,可以移动。当世界更新时,它将对碰撞做出反应。

trans-unit.source: A factor that is multiplied with a value that based on the average round trip time to compute the timeout limit.
trans-unit.target: 将因子乘以基于平均往返时间的值以计算超时限制。

trans-unit.source: A filepath to an image to use as the window's icon. Not all operating systems support very large icon images. The icon can also be changed with love.window.setIcon.
trans-unit.target: 图像的文件路径，用作窗口的图标。并非所有操作系统都支持非常大的图标图像。也可以使用love.window.setIcon更改图标。

trans-unit.source: A flat table containing the 16 matrix elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含16个矩阵元素的平面表。

trans-unit.source: A force pushes a body in a direction. A body with with a larger mass will react less. The reaction also depends on how long a force is applied: since the force acts continuously over the entire timestep, a short timestep will only push the body for a short time. Thus forces are best used for many timesteps to give a continuous push to a body (like gravity). For a single push that is independent of timestep, it is better to use Body:applyLinearImpulse.
trans-unit.target: 力将身体推向一个方向。质量较大的物体的反应较小。反应还取决于施加力的时间：由于该力在整个时间步长中持续作用，因此较短的时间步长只会在短时间内推动人体。因此，最好在许多时间步中使用力来连续推动身体（如重力）。对于独立于时间步长的单个推动，最好使用Body：applyLinearImpulse。

trans-unit.source: A format suitable for high dynamic range content - an alias for the rgba16f format, normally.
trans-unit.target: 适合高动态范围内容的格式-通常是 rgba16f 格式的别名。

trans-unit.source: A function called for each fixture intersected by the ray. The function gets six arguments and should return a number as a control value.
trans-unit.target: 为每一个与射线相交的夹具调用的函数。该函数得到六个参数,并应返回一个数字作为控制值。

trans-unit.source: A function called for each fixture intersected by the ray. The function gets six arguments and should return a number as a control value. The intersection points fed into the function will be in an arbitrary order. If you wish to find the closest point of intersection, you'll need to do that yourself within the function. The easiest way to do that is by using the fraction value.
trans-unit.target: 为每一个与射线相交的夹具调用的函数。该函数得到六个参数,并应返回一个数字作为控制值。输入到函数中的交点将以任意顺序排列。如果您希望找到最近的交点,您需要自己在函数中进行。最简单的方法是使用分数值。

trans-unit.source: A function that iterates over all the lines in the file
trans-unit.target: 一个遍历文件中所有行的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called for each file and folder in the directory. The filename is passed to the function as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 对目录中的每个文件和文件夹进行调用的函数。文件名作为参数传递给函数。

trans-unit.source: A game is in fused mode if the source .love has been fused to the executable (see Game Distribution), or if "--fused" has been given as a command-line argument when starting the game.
trans-unit.target: 如果源.love已与可执行文件融合在一起（请参阅游戏发行版），或者在启动游戏时已将“ --fused”作为命令行参数给出，则游戏处于融合模式。

trans-unit.source: A good rule of thumb is to use stream for music files and static for all short sound effects. Basically, you want to avoid loading large files into memory at once.
trans-unit.target: 一个好的经验法则是对音乐文件使用 stream ，对所有短音效使用 static 。基本上，您要避免一次将大文件加载到内存中。

trans-unit.source: A light userdata is equal to "any" light userdata with the same C address.
trans-unit.target: 一个轻用户数据等于 "任何 "具有相同C地址的轻用户数据。

trans-unit.source: A light userdata represents a pointer. It is a value (like a number): you do not create it, it has no individual metatable, and it is not garbage collected (as it was never created).
trans-unit.target: 一个轻量级的用户数据代表一个指针,它是一个值(就像数字一样):你没有创建它,它没有单独的元数据,也不会被垃圾回收(因为从来没有创建过)。它是一个值(就像一个数字):你没有创建它,它没有单独的元数据,也不会被垃圾回收(因为它从未被创建)。

trans-unit.source: A list of active touch-press id values, which can be used with love.touch.getPosition.
trans-unit.target: 可以与love.touch.getPosition一起使用的有效触摸式ID值的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of points to construct the ChainShape, in the form of {x1, y1, x2, y2, ...}.
trans-unit.target: 以 {x1, y1, x2, y2, ...} 的形式构造ChainShape的点的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of the source's active effect names.
trans-unit.target: 源的活动效果名称列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of vertices to construct the polygon, in the form of {x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, ...}.
trans-unit.target: 以 {x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, ...} 的形式构造多边形的顶点列表。

trans-unit.source: A list with all contacts associated with the Body.
trans-unit.target: 与该机构有关的所有联系人名单;

trans-unit.source: A mipmap level. Must be in the range of [1, CompressedImageData:getMipmapCount()].
A mipmap level. Must be in the range of [1, CompressedImageData:getMipmapCount()].
A new Canvas with dimensions equal to the window's size in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的Canvas,尺寸等于窗口的像素大小。

trans-unit.source: A new Canvas with specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 新建一个具有指定宽度和高度的Canvas。

trans-unit.source: A new Data object containing the compressed version of the raw data.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的数据对象,包含原始数据的压缩版本。

trans-unit.source: A new Data object containing the compressed version of the string.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的数据对象,包含字符串的压缩版本。

trans-unit.source: A new Image object which can be drawn on screen.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的图像对象,可以在屏幕上绘制。

trans-unit.source: A new Source that can play the specified audio.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以播放指定音频的新源。

trans-unit.source: A new Source that can play the specified audio. The SourceType of the returned audio is "static".
trans-unit.target: 可以播放指定音频的新音源。返回的音频的SourceType为“静态”。

trans-unit.source: A new Thread that has yet to be started.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的主题,还没有开始。

trans-unit.source: A new Transform object representing the inverse of this Transform's matrix.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的Transform对象,代表这个Transform矩阵的反。

trans-unit.source: A new framebuffer with specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的framebuffer,具有指定的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: A new framebuffer with width/height equal to the window width/height.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的framebuffer,宽度/高度等于窗口的宽度/高度。

trans-unit.source: A note about angles in LÖVE: Angles are expressed in terms of radians, with values in the range of 0 to 2Π (approximately 6.28); you may be more used to working in terms of degrees. Because of how the coordinate system is set up, with an origin in the upper left corner, angles in LÖVE may seem a bit backwards: 0 points right (along the X axis), ¼Π points diagonally down and to the right, ½Π points directly down (along the Y axis), with increasing values continuing clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 关于LÖVE中的角度的注释：角度以弧度表示，值的范围为0到2Π（约6.28）。在学位方面，您可能会更习惯。由于坐标系的设置方式（原点位于左上角），所以LÖVE中的角度似乎有些向后：右0点（沿X轴），对角线向下和向右¼Π点，直接½Π点向下（沿Y轴），且值沿顺时针方向连续增加。

trans-unit.source: A number in density-independent units to convert to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个以密度为单位的数字,转换成像素。

trans-unit.source: A number in pixels to convert to density-independent units.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的数字,转换为与密度无关的单位。

trans-unit.source: A numerical indexed table with the red, green and blue values as numbers.
trans-unit.target: 数字索引表，其中红色，绿色和蓝色值为数字。

trans-unit.source: A numerical indexed table with the red, green, blue and alpha values as numbers.
trans-unit.target: 数字索引表，其中红色，绿色，蓝色和alpha值为数字。

trans-unit.source: A numerical indexed table with the red, green, blue and alpha values as numbers. The alpha is optional and defaults to 1 if it is left out.
trans-unit.target: 数字索引表，其中红色，绿色，蓝色和alpha值为数字。Alpha是可选的，如果省略，则默认为1。

trans-unit.source: A numerical indexed table with the red, green, blue and alpha values as numbers. The alpha is optional and defaults to 255 if it is left out.
trans-unit.target: 数字索引表，其中红色，绿色，蓝色和alpha值为数字。Alpha是可选的，如果省略则默认为255。

trans-unit.source: A pattern is read from back to front.
A positive sharpness value makes the image use a more detailed mipmap level when drawing, at the expense of performance. A negative value does the reverse.
trans-unit.target: 正的锐度值会使图像在绘制时使用更详细的mipmap级别,但会牺牲性能。负值则相反。

trans-unit.source: A positive sharpness value makes the texture use a more detailed mipmap level when drawing, at the expense of performance. A negative value does the reverse.
trans-unit.target: 正的锐度值会使纹理在绘制时使用更详细的mipmap级别,但会牺牲性能。负值则相反。

trans-unit.source: A prismatic joint constrains two bodies to move relatively to each other on a specified axis. It does not allow for relative rotation. Its definition and operation are similar to a revolute joint, but with translation and force substituted for angle and torque.
trans-unit.target: 棱柱形关节约束两个物体在指定的轴上相对移动。它不允许相对旋转。其定义和操作类似于旋转关节，但平移和力代替了角度和扭矩。

trans-unit.source: A quadrilateral (a polygon with four sides and four corners) with texture coordinate information.
trans-unit.target: 具有纹理坐标信息的四边形(四边四角的多边形)。

trans-unit.source: A quadrilateral that has its top left corner located at 0,0 and whose width and height are 100 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 四边形的左上角位于0,0,宽度和高度都是100像素。

trans-unit.source: A quadrilateral with texture coordinate information.
trans-unit.target: 具有纹理坐标信息的四边形。

trans-unit.source: A random number generation object which has its own random state.
trans-unit.target: 一个随机数生成对象,它有自己的随机状态。

trans-unit.source: A raw void* pointer to the Data, or nil if FFI is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 指向数据的原始 void* 指针；如果FFI不可用，则为 nil 。

trans-unit.source: A raw pointer to the Data.
trans-unit.target: 一个指向数据的原始指针。

trans-unit.source: A ring buffer is used internally to store recorded data until RecordingDevice:getData or RecordingDevice:stop are called – the former clears the buffer. If the buffer completely fills up before getData or stop are called, the oldest data that doesn't fit into the buffer will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用环形缓冲区来存储记录的数据，直到调用RecordingDevice：getData或RecordingDevice：stop为止–前者清除缓冲区。如果在调用getData或stop之前缓冲区已完全填满，则不适合缓冲区的最旧数据将丢失。

trans-unit.source: A sawtooth wave, also known as a ramp wave. Named for its linear rise, and (near-)instantaneous fall along time.
trans-unit.target: 锯齿波,又称斜坡波。因其线性上升、(近乎)瞬时下降而得名。

trans-unit.source: A shape with a restitution of 0 will still bounce a little if the shape it collides with has a restitution higher than 0.
trans-unit.target: 形状的还原度为0,如果与之碰撞的形状的还原度高于0,那么它仍然会有一点反弹。

trans-unit.source: A simple example showing the general usage of a thread and using channels for communication.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的例子,展示了线程的一般用法和使用通道进行通信。

trans-unit.source: A simple table containing information on an event.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含事件信息的简单表格。

trans-unit.source: A sine wave. Follows a trigonometric sine function.
trans-unit.target: 一个正弦波。遵循三角正弦函数。

trans-unit.source: A sleeping body is much more efficient to simulate than when awake.
trans-unit.target: 睡眠中的身体比清醒时的模拟效率要高得多。

trans-unit.source: A sleeping body will also wake up if another body collides with it or if a joint or contact attached to it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果有另一个身体与它相撞,或者连接在它身上的关节或触点被破坏,沉睡的身体也会醒来。

trans-unit.source: A specific layer of an array image can be drawn with love.graphics.drawLayer / SpriteBatch:addLayer, or with the Quad variant of love.graphics.draw and Quad:setLayer, or via a custom Shader.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用love.graphics.drawLayer / SpriteBatch：addLayer绘制，或使用love.graphics.draw和Quad：setLayer的Quad变体绘制，或通过自定义着色器绘制阵列图像的特定层。

trans-unit.source: A square wave. Switches between high and low states (near-)instantaneously.
trans-unit.target: 一个方波。在高低状态之间(近乎)瞬间切换。

trans-unit.source: A static body has no mass and a constant position. It will not react to collisions. Often used for walls.
trans-unit.target: 静止的物体没有质量,位置不变。它不会对碰撞作出反应。常用于墙体。

trans-unit.source: A stipple pattern is made up of a 16bit sequence of 0s and 1s, Just like binary.
trans-unit.target: 纹章图案是由16位的0和1序列组成,就像二进制一样。

trans-unit.source: A string containing data previously compressed with love.data.compress.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含以前用love.data.compress压缩的数据。

trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含以前用love.math.compress压缩的数据。

trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于确定如何打包值。遵循Lua 5.3的string.pack格式strings的规则。

trans-unit.source: A table containing filepaths to images (or File, FileData, ImageData, or CompressedImageData objects), in an array. Each sub-image must have the same dimensions. A table of tables can also be given, where each sub-table contains all mipmap levels for the slice index of that sub-table.

trans-unit.source: A table containing information about the specified path, or nil if nothing exists at the path. The table contains the following fields:

trans-unit.source: A table containing the list of vertex indices used when drawing.

trans-unit.source: A table containing the position and color of the first point, in the form of {x, y, r, g, b, a}. The color components are optional.

A table of width/height pairs. (Note that this may not be in order.)

trans-unit.source: A table which will be filled in with info about the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 一个表格,其中将填入指定路径的信息。

trans-unit.source: A table which will be filled in with the stat fields below.
trans-unit.target: 一个表格,将用下面的统计字段填写。

trans-unit.source: A table with red, green, blue, and optional alpha color components in the range of [0, 1] to send to the extern as a vector.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含红、绿、蓝和可选的alpha颜色成分的表格,在[0,1]的范围内以矢量的形式发送到外部。

trans-unit.source: A table with red, green, blue, and optional alpha color components in the range of [0, 255] to send to the extern as a vector.
trans-unit.target: 在[0,255]范围内包含红、绿、蓝和可选的alpha颜色组件的表格,以矢量形式发送到外部。

trans-unit.source: A table with the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 一个包含以下字段的表格:

trans-unit.source: A table with vertex information, in the form of {attributecomponent, ...}.
trans-unit.target: 具有顶点信息的表，形式为 {attributecomponent, ...} 。
一个包含顶点信息的表格。
以毫秒为单位的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: A triangle wave. Follows a linear rise and fall that repeats periodically.
trans-unit.target: 三角形波浪。沿着线性上升和下降,周期性地重复。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 radians will mean "looking to the right". .Although radians increase counter-clockwise, the y axis points down so it becomes
trans-unit.target: 弧度值为0则表示 "向右看"。虽然弧度是逆时针增加的,但y轴是向下的,所以它变成了 "向右看"。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 radians will mean "looking to the right". Although radians increase counter-clockwise, the y axis points down so it becomes
trans-unit.target: 弧度值为0则表示 "向右看"。虽然弧度是逆时针增加的,但y轴是向下的,所以它变成了 "向右看"。

trans-unit.source: A variable is a value like val, var, and any other letter or word that is not already assigned to something else.
trans-unit.target: 变量是一个值,如val,var,以及任何其他字母或单词,它还没有分配给其他东西。

trans-unit.source: A world is an object that contains all bodies and joints.
trans-unit.target: 世界是一个包含所有身体和关节的物体。

trans-unit.source: ASTC is only supported by very new mobile devices (e.g. the iPhone 6), and the latest Skylake (and newer) integrated Intel GPUs. It has a variety of variants to allow for picking the most compressed possible one that doesn't have any noticeable compression artifacts, for a given texture.
trans-unit.target: ASTC只支持很新的移动设备(如iPhone 6),以及最新的Skylake(和更新的)集成英特尔GPU。它有各种变体,以便为给定的纹理选择最可能的压缩,没有任何明显的压缩伪影。

trans-unit.source: ASTC is supported by new mobile devices (e.g. the iPhone 6 and newer), Android devices which have Adreno 4xx (and later) GPUs, and Skylake (and newer) integrated Intel GPUs. It has a variety of variants to allow for picking the most compressed possible one that doesn't have any noticeable compression artifacts, for a given texture.
trans-unit.target: ASTC被新的移动设备(如iPhone 6和更新的设备)、拥有Adreno 4xx(和更高版本)GPU的Android设备以及Skylake(和更新的)集成Intel GPU的设备所支持。它有各种变体,以便为给定的纹理挑选最可能压缩的一个,没有任何明显的压缩伪影。
